prompt_template: Act as a trauma-informed family-law triage analyst. From the attached documents for session {session_id}, extract incidents and tag them using the post-separation abuse wheel (CounterParenting, AlienationAllegations, NeglectfulParenting, CoerciveControl, Isolation, HarassmentStalking, LegalAbuse, FinancialAbuse). Return only a JSON matching the intake schema. For any missing critical data ask up to 3 clarifying questions. Do not guess.

Act as a family-law analyst. Map intake incidents to coercive-control legal elements for {jurisdiction}. Output legal_matrix.json with severity 0-5 and citations for each element. Propose two mapping frameworks and recommend one.
Act as a litigation-risk analyst. Classify each filing as routine|aggressive|abusive with two supporting citations. Compute filing_repetition_index and novelty_score.
Draft a hearing_pack.docx: exhibit index, proposed findings of fact (each finding must cite a source). Do not introduce new facts.
Write a one-page Grade 7-9 plain-language letter summarizing findings, immediate safety steps, and top 5 evidence items to collect. Include 'not legal advice' disclaimer.
Draft a {n_pages_limit}-page declaration using only cited facts. Number paragraphs and add exhibit callouts.
Find top statutes/cases/practice guides on coercive control and PSLA in {jurisdiction} (past {time_horizon_years}). Provide pinpoint quotes and relevance.
Score artifacts for citation density, quote fidelity, jurisdiction fit, trauma tone, child safety, and hallucination risk. Return eval.json.
